sentences.en: As a mammalian gene transfer vector, baculovirus owns some unique advantages.
sentences.cn: 杆状病毒作为哺乳动物细胞基因转移的载体有很多独特的优点.

sentences.en: Astrocytes make up the majority of the cells in the mammalian brain.
sentences.cn: 在哺乳动物的大脑中,绝大部分细胞是星形胶质细胞.

sentences.en: Both of these receptors are commonly found in mammalian skin.
sentences.cn: 上面这两种受器在哺乳类的皮肤上都很容易发现.

sentences.en: But is it more than just the infusion of the catecholamine neurotransmitter, dopamine, or the mammalian hormone oxytocin?
sentences.cn: 而它也许不止是儿茶酚胺类神经递质注入剂、多巴胺、或哺乳类动物的荷尔蒙催产素？

sentences.en: Glucose and glutamine metabolism in cultured mammalian cells in this paper.
sentences.cn: 综述体外培养哺乳动物细胞的葡萄糖和谷氨酰胺代谢.

sentences.en: Glutamatergic synapses are common excitatory chemical connections in mammalian central nervous system.
sentences.cn: 谷氨酸性突触是哺乳动物神经系统的主要兴奋性突触.

sentences.en: In mammalian species, a variety of chromosomal rearrangements are known to exist.
sentences.cn: 在哺乳类的物种中, 已知有许多类型的染色体内部重新排列.

sentences.en: Indeed, he takes this evolutionary process seriously: he is fond of pointing out to his audiences that they have both “mammalian” and “reptilian” brains that can be employed at different moments.
sentences.cn: 实际上，罗闻全对待这种进化过程的态度是认真的：他喜欢向听众指出，他们都拥有可以在不同时刻使用的“哺乳动物”和“爬虫类”大脑。

sentences.en: Mammalian cell culture process development for the production of recombinant proteins.
sentences.cn: 用于重组蛋白生产的哺乳动物细胞培养工艺开发.

sentences.en: Mammalian central nervous system is a very heterogenous and complicated system.
sentences.cn: 哺乳动物中枢神经系统是非常复杂的异质性器官.

sentences.en: Most mammalian cells contain multiple species of DNA dependent DNA polymerases.
sentences.cn: 大部分哺乳动物细胞均含有多种依赖DNA的DNA聚合酶.

sentences.en: Sometimes this is for good reason, because we understand the greater social cost of profligacy, but often it's just because our mammalian brains are programmed that way.
sentences.cn: 有时候理由是很正当的，因为我们想到了更大范围的社会上的浪费，但更多的时候，仅仅是因为我们脑中那根哺乳动物的弦。

sentences.en: The citrate synthase of mammalian tissues have been shown to be inhibited by ATP.
sentences.cn: 有人已经证实哺乳动物组织的柠檬酸合成酶受ATP的抑制.

sentences.en: The disease can spread from one mammalian species to another.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病能够在不同的哺乳类物种之间传播。

sentences.en: The formal genetics of mammalian cells has been dependent on breeding experiment with whole organisms.
sentences.cn: 哺乳动物细胞的表型遗传学取决于整个机体的繁殖实验.

sentences.en: The report is on mammalian thermoregulation.
sentences.cn: 那份报告是有关哺乳动物的体温调节.

sentences.en: The scientist has made a pointed comparison between suspensors of plant embryos and mammalian trophoblasts.
sentences.cn: 这位科学家把植物胚的胚柄与哺乳动物的滋养层做了直接的比较.

sentences.en: Those in mammalian cells, the cerebrosides and gangliosides, may perform similar functions.
sentences.cn: 在哺乳动物细胞中脑磷脂和神经节苷脂可能执行同样的功能.

trans.tran_en: In zoology, mammalian means relating to mammals
